faq.question: What is Composer?
faq.answer: Composer is a tool for dependency management in PHP. It allows you to declare the libraries your project depends on and it will manage (install/update) them for you. You can learn more at https://getcomposer.org.

faq.question: What is Composer for DirectAdmin?
faq.answer: Webonize, for security reasons, restricts SSH access so a user can only connect to SSH with SSH key configured. Not all users know how to setup SSH Keys, some of which might need PHP Composer tool. With Composer for DirectAdmin, you can use Composer in an easy and safe way without accessing SSH.
